name: Peppa Pig
overview: Peppa Pig is an energetic piggy who lives with Mummy, Daddy, and little brother George. She loves to jump in mud puddles and make loud snorting noises.

episodes.name: Muddy Puddles
episodes.overview: It's raining and Peppa is sad because she can't play outside. When the rain stops, Peppa and George get to play one of their favourite games - jumping in muddy puddles! When Mummy and Daddy Pig join in, things get very muddy indeed.

episodes.name: Mr. Dinosaur is Lost
episodes.overview: Mr Dinosaur is George's favourite toy. When Mr Dinosaur goes missing, George is distraught. Daddy Pig helps Peppa to become a detective and together they track down Mr Dinosaur, making George a very happy little piggy again.

episodes.name: Best Friend
episodes.overview: Peppa's best friend, Suzy Sheep, comes to play. George wants to play too, but Peppa refuses to let him do so, making him sad.

episodes.name: Polly Parrot
episodes.overview: Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house, and meet their new parrot, Polly.

episodes.name: Hide and Seek
episodes.overview: George and Peppa are playing hide and seek, and Peppa thinks that George is bad at the game.

episodes.name: The Playgroup
episodes.overview: George is joining Peppa at her playgroup but she doesn't really want him there - until her friends decide that George is brilliant.

episodes.name: Mommy Pig at Work
episodes.overview: Mummy Pig is trying to work on her computer, however when Peppa and George are trying to play their computer game "Happy Mrs. Chicken," The computer crashes.

episodes.name: Piggy in the Middle
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family visit a new theme park where there is lots of fun to be had with vegetables.

episodes.name: Daddy Loses His Glasses
episodes.overview: Granny and Grandpa's pet Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love her but Polly flies away. Can George get her back?

episodes.name: Gardening
episodes.overview: Peppa and the others plant a strawberry tree, but it takes a long time for the seed to grow.

episodes.name: Hiccups
episodes.overview: Peppa gets the unbearable Hiccups.

episodes.name: Bicycles
episodes.overview: Peppa Pig and George decide it is a great day to go and ride bicycles while Daddy Pig is admiring a prize-winning pumpkin he has. However Peppa accidentally smashes into the pumpkin!

episodes.name: Secrets
episodes.overview: Mummy Pig gives Peppa a box, which has to be kept a secret.

episodes.name: Flying a Kite
episodes.overview: Peppa goes outside and plays with her kite.

episodes.name: Picnic
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family go on a picnic.

episodes.name: Musical Instruments
episodes.overview: Mummy and Daddy Pig find an old box in the attic. It is full of musical instruments.

episodes.name: Frogs & Worms & Butterflies
episodes.overview: Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden. Peppa pretends to be a butterfly.

episodes.name: Dressing Up
episodes.overview:
Peppa, George, and her friends play dress up.

Peppa and George love dressing up, so one day they creep into Mummy and Daddy's room and dress up in their clothes.

episodes.name: New Shoes
episodes.overview: Peppa loses her shoes, but she gets new red ones, making her happy again.

episodes.name: The School Fete
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family go to the school fete. Peppa and George have their faces painted as tigers, and Daddy Pig makes a dinosaur out of a balloon.

episodes.name: Mummy Pig's Birthday
episodes.overview: Mummy Pig celebrates her birthday with her family. Peppa, George and Daddy Pig prepare a wonderful birthday surprise for Mummy Pig.

episodes.name: The Tooth Fairy
episodes.overview: Pedro gets a cough at playschool and the other children soon catch it.

episodes.name: The New Car
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family are going for a drive. Suddenly their car breaks down.

episodes.name: Treasure Hunt
episodes.overview: Granny and Grandpa Pig organise a treasure hunt in the garden for Peppa and George.

episodes.name: Not Very Well
episodes.overview: Peppa is ill and has red spots all over her face. Dr Brown Bear tells her she will be fine but she must stay in bed.

episodes.name: Snow
episodes.overview: Peppa and George go outside to play in the snow.

episodes.name: Windy Castle
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family go to Windy Castle, and when they get there, they see Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house.

episodes.name: My Cousin Chloé
episodes.overview: Peppa's older cousin Chloe comes to visit, and Peppa must play games by somebody else's rules for a change.

episodes.name: Pancakes
episodes.overview: The cheeky piglet and her brother George discover how worms in Grandpa's compost heap transform vegetable peelings into fertiliser to help Granny's plants grow strong.

episodes.name: Babysitting
episodes.overview: Mummy and Daddy Pig go out for the evening, leaving Granny and Grandpa Pig to babysit an excitable Peppa and George.

episodes.name: Ballet Lesson
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

episodes.name: Thunderstorm
episodes.overview: Peppa and George get caught in a thunderstorm.

episodes.name: Cleaning The Car
episodes.overview: Daddy Pig is taking everyone for a drive in the country, but the car is very muddy and Mummy insists they wash it first.

episodes.name: Lunch
episodes.overview: When the family goes to Granny and Grandpa Pig's house for dinner, George is reluctant to eat his salad.

episodes.name: Camping
episodes.overview: Peppa and family go camping, but soon realise that their tent is too small for everyone to fit in.

episodes.name: The Sleepy Princess
episodes.overview: It's bedtime but Peppa is not sleepy, so Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a pretty princess and a dinosaur!

episodes.name: The Tree House
episodes.overview: Grandpa Pig has a surprise for Peppa and George - a beautiful tree house in his garden.

episodes.name: Fancy Dress Party
episodes.overview: Peppa and George have a fancy dress party and all their friends are invited. Peppa dresses as a fairy princess and George as a scary dinosaur.

episodes.name: The Museum
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family visit the museum. Peppa likes the Kings and Queens room, whereas George's favourite is the dinosaur room.

episodes.name: Very Hot Day
episodes.overview: Daddy teaches the children how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

episodes.name: Chloe's Puppet Show
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family visit Uncle Pig, Aunty Pig and Cousin Chloe. Chloe has a new puppet theatre.

episodes.name: Daddy Gets Fit
episodes.overview: Peppa and all her friends at playgroup dress up as different countries from all over the world.

episodes.name: Tidying Up
episodes.overview: Peppa and George are told to tidy their room, because it is so messy.

episodes.name: The Playground
episodes.overview: Peppa and George go to the playground, and Peppa's friends are also there.

episodes.name: Daddy Puts Up a Picture
episodes.overview: Daddy Pig decides to put up a picture of Peppa and George on the wall, but accidentally cracks the wall while doing it.

episodes.name: At The Beach
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family go to the beach, and they do lots of things there.

episodes.name: Mister Skinnylegs
episodes.overview: George finds a spider in the bathroom sink, and when Peppa sees it, she screams and runs downstairs to tell Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig.

episodes.name: Grandpa Pig's Boat
episodes.overview: Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat, but Grandpa Pig and Grandpa Dog get into a fight.

episodes.name: Shopping
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family go to the shops for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake too.

episodes.name: My Birthday Party
episodes.overview: It's Peppa Pig's birthday today. Peppa wakes up very early so she doesn't waste any of her special day.

episodes.name: Daddy's Movie Camera
episodes.overview: Daddy Pig gets a new movie camera, but has some difficulties with it.

episodes.name: School Play
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends take part in a school play.

episodes.name: Bubbles
episodes.overview: Peppa and George have fun blowing bubbles. When the mixture is used up, Daddy Pig makes his own.

episodes.name: Emily Elephant
episodes.overview: A new child visits the playgroup, and is a bit shy. Her name is Emily Elephant.

episodes.name: Polly's Holiday
episodes.overview: Granny and Grandpa's pet Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love her but Polly flies away. Can George get her back?

episodes.name: Teddy's Day Out
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family share a picnic with Mr Zebra the Postman and Zoe Zebra. But when it's time to go home, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

episodes.name: Mysteries
episodes.overview: Inspired by their favourite television programme, Peppa and George want to be famous detectives too. Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve.

episodes.name: George's Friend
episodes.overview: Rebecca Rabbit has a little brother called Richard who is the same age as George.

episodes.name: Mr Scarecrow
episodes.overview: Peppa and George help Grandpa Pig to make a scarecrow to stop the birds eating the flower seeds.

episodes.name: Windy Autumn Day
episodes.overview: It is a cold and windy day so Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig wear their hats and scarves and coats to the park.

episodes.name: The Time Capsule
episodes.overview: Madame Gazelle shows Peppa and her school friends how to make a time capsule. They discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

episodes.name: Rock Pools
episodes.overview: Peppa and George are at the seaside with Granny and Grandpa Pig. Peppa rescues a little fish and puts it back in the sea.

episodes.name: Recycling
episodes.overview: Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig teaches them how to recycle the bottles and newspapers.

episodes.name: The Boat Pond
episodes.overview: Peppa, her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit.

episodes.name: Traffic Jam
episodes.overview: Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. On the way, Peppa's family get caught in a very long traffic jam.

episodes.name: Bedtime
episodes.overview: It's nearly time for bed. Peppa and George play outside then they are called in for their bath.

episodes.name: Sports Day
episodes.overview: It is Sports Day at Peppa's playgroup and lots of special events are due to take place.

episodes.name: The Eye Test
episodes.overview: Peppa's friend Pedro wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician.

episodes.name: Granddad Dog's Garage
episodes.overview: Daddy Pig's car runs out of petrol but Granddad Dog's garage is not far away. With one phone call, Granddad Dog is on his way.

episodes.name: Foggy Day
episodes.overview: Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are taking Peppa and George to play in the playground when it suddenly gets so foggy they can't see anything.

episodes.name: Jumble Sale
episodes.overview: Peppa's playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell.

episodes.name: Swimming
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool. George is a little worried at first but is soon splashing happily with his friend Richard Rabbit.

episodes.name: Tiny Creatures
episodes.overview: Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

episodes.name: Daddy Pig's Office
episodes.overview: Peppa and George visit Daddy Pig's office and meet his colleagues. Mr Rabbit works with numbers, while Mrs Cat seems to spend her time drawing shapes on a computer.

episodes.name: Pirate Island
episodes.overview: Grandpa and Granny Pig take Peppa, George and all their friends on a boat trip to Pirate Island. On the island, Grandpa shows everyone how to use his metal detector to find treasure and they all build a big sandcastle.

episodes.name: George Catches A Cold
episodes.overview: Peppa and George love jumping in muddy puddles, even when it's raining - but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After plenty of rest and some warm milk and honey, George begins to feel much better.

episodes.name: The Balloon Ride
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family are at the school fete where the top prize in the raffle is a trip in a hot air balloon.

episodes.name: George's Birthday
episodes.overview: Today is George's birthday and Mummy and Daddy Pig have a special day planned. George gets a new Brontosaurus toy and the family go to the museum to see lots of different dinosaurs, including a robot dinosaur that actually moves and roars! The special day ends with a big cake and all of Peppa and George's friends having fun together.

episodes.name: The Long Grass
episodes.overview: The grass has grown so long that Peppa and George's ball gets lost in it. It falls to Grandpa to save the day with Betsy, his motorised lawnmower.

episodes.name: Zoe Zebra The Postman's Daughter
episodes.overview: Zoe Zebra delivers a very special letter for Peppa and George - an invitation to her birthday party.

episodes.name: Painting
episodes.overview: Peppa, George and Daddy are in the garden painting a picture of a cherry tree when the ducks turn up and run through the paint - and all over their masterpiece.

episodes.name: Cuckoo Clock
episodes.overview: Daddy Pig winds up the old cuckoo clock in Peppa and George's bedroom. When the clock strikes the hour, a wooden bird pops out, flapping its wings and singing 'Cuckoo!'.

episodes.name: The Baby Piggy
episodes.overview: Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chloe and will get to meet Chloe's new baby brother, Alexander, for the first time.

episodes.name: Grandpa's Little Train
episodes.overview: Grandpa Pig has built a fantastic little train called Gertrude. When he takes Peppa and George for a ride on Gertrude, they meet their friends along the way. There is plenty of room on the train for everyone, so they all hop aboard. Peppa and George think that Gertrude is the very best train in the whole world!

episodes.name: The Cycle Ride
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family go for a day's cycle ride. Peppa rides her little bicycle, while Mummy and Daddy Pig ride their tandem with George on the back. Peppa loves cycling downhill but is not so keen on peddling uphill, so she insists they should have a downhill race.

episodes.name: Ice Skating
episodes.overview: Peppa and George go ice skating, but they have never been before and Peppa keeps falling over.

episodes.name: The Dentist
episodes.overview: When Peppa and George go to the dentist for a check-up, Dr Elephant says their teeth are nice and white - but George's toy dinosaur is in need of a tooth-clean.

episodes.name: Dens
episodes.overview: Peppa decides that only girls can play in her treehouse, so Grandpa Pig builds the boys their own den. But when it starts to rain, the boys and girls rush out to play together in the muddy puddles.

episodes.name: Pretend Friend
episodes.overview: Suzy Sheep has come to play with Peppa, and has made up a pretend friend called 'Leo Lion'. Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy announces that Leo likes roaring and he likes playing dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along with the game. But Peppa's little brother George cannot see Leo and feels a bit left out.

episodes.name: School Bus Trip
episodes.overview: Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her school friends on a school bus trip to the mountains. From the top of the mountains, there is a fantastic view and Peppa and her friends have fun hearing echoes.

episodes.name: Rebecca Rabbit
episodes.overview: Peppa and George go to Rebecca Rabbit's house where, instead of stairs and corridors, there are tunnels!

episodes.name: Nature Trail
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family follow a nature trail in the countryside, discovering footprints left by little birds and ants.

episodes.name: Pen Pal
episodes.overview: Peppa has a new pen pal, a little donkey from France, named Delphine. Peppa receives letters from Delphine Donkey and speaks to her on the telephone. Although Peppa speaks English and Delphine speaks French, they discover that they love lots of the same things, especially jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

episodes.name: Granny & Grandpa's Attic
episodes.overview: Peppa and George are helping Granny and Grandpa Pig tidy their attic, but they have trouble deciding what to throw out, because Granny and Grandpa want to keep everything. Amongst the clutter, Peppa finds an old record player and some funny old records. The record player still works and soon everyone is dancing.

episodes.name: The Quarrel
episodes.overview: Peppa and Suzy Sheep are best friends. But one day they have a quarrel over a game of cards and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but still they refuse to make up. Will they ever say sorry?

episodes.name: The Toy Cupboard
episodes.overview: Peppa and George's toy basket is full and their beds are covered in toys, so Mummy Pig decides it is time to order a new toy cupboard. The cupboard arrives in the post but it needs to be assembled - and Mummy and Daddy Pig are not very good at DIY. Luckily help is at hand, as Mr Zebra the Postman loves assembling flat pack furniture.

episodes.name: School Camp
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends go on a camping trip with their teacher, Madame Gazelle. After pitching their tents and collecting sticks, they all sing a song around the campfire.

episodes.name: Captain Daddy Pig
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family borrow Grandpa Pig's boat and head out for a day on the river. All is going well until the boat gets stuck in some long reeds - Daddy Pig to the rescue!

episodes.name: The Powercut
episodes.overview: It is evening. Peppa and George are in the sitting room dancing to their favourite song.

episodes.name: Bouncy Ball
episodes.overview: Peppa and George are playing in the garden with their bouncy ball when Suzy Sheep turns up with two tennis rackets. She uses the bouncy ball to play a game of tennis with Peppa, making George feel left out. Will the job of ball boy cheer him up?

episodes.name: Stars
episodes.overview: It is night time and the sky is fall of shining stars. Mummy and Daddy Pig let Peppa and George put their coats on over their pyjamas and go outside to look at the stars. With the help of a telescope, Daddy Pig teaches Peppa and George how to find the North Star.

episodes.name: Daddy Pig's Birthday
episodes.overview: Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

episodes.name: Sleepover
episodes.overview: When Peppa goes for a sleepover at Zoe Zebra's house with Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit, Candy Cat and Emily Elephant, the girls are too excited to go to sleep.

episodes.name: Cold Winter Day
episodes.overview: It is a very cold winter's day, and Peppa and George head to the park to play. All the puddles have frozen over, so the two must think of other ways to entertain themselves.

episodes.name: Work and Play
episodes.overview: When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a shop. But they quickly find it is very tiring!

episodes.name: The Rainbow
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

episodes.name: Pedro's Cough
episodes.overview: Pedro gets a cough at playschool and the other children soon catch it.

episodes.name: The Library
episodes.overview: Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

episodes.name: The Camper Van
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family go on holiday in a special van.

episodes.name: Camping Holiday
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family are on holiday in their special camper van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a park where they can see the ducks in the river.

episodes.name: Compost
episodes.overview: The cheeky piglet and her brother George discover how worms in Grandpa's compost heap transform vegetable peelings into fertiliser to help Granny's plants grow strong.

episodes.name: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play
episodes.overview: Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, while Suzy Sheep plays with Peppa. They all end up jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

episodes.name: Fun Run
episodes.overview: Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof. It is far easier to run when a wasp is chasing him.

episodes.name: Washing
episodes.overview: Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud.

episodes.name: Polly's Boat Trip
episodes.overview: Peppa and George go on a boat trip with Grandpa Pig, but they must send Polly Parrot for help when their boat runs aground.

episodes.name: Delphine Donkey
episodes.overview: Peppa teaches her French friend Delphine a song when she comes to stay.

episodes.name: The Fire Engine
episodes.overview: Peppa and George go to the fire station to see Miss Rabbit's fire engine.

episodes.name: Princess Peppa
episodes.overview: Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

episodes.name: Teddy Playgroup
episodes.overview: Peppa brings home a teddy from playgroup to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

episodes.name: Danny's Pirate Party
episodes.overview: It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Grandad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

episodes.name: Mr Potato Comes To Town
episodes.overview: All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports centre.

episodes.name: The Train Ride
episodes.overview: Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets.

episodes.name: Granny Pig's Chickens
episodes.overview: Granny Pig shows Peppa and George her poultry. Elsewhere, something has been eating Grandpa Pig's lettuces.

episodes.name: Talent Day
episodes.overview: It is Talent Day at Peppa's playgroup. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

episodes.name: A Trip To The Moon
episodes.overview: Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant.

episodes.name: Grandpa At The Playground
episodes.overview: Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but does not understand the children's rules.

episodes.name: Goldie The Fish
episodes.overview: Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

episodes.name: Funfair
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family go to a funfair, but Mummy Pig is told she will not be able to win prizes in any of the competitions.

episodes.name: Numbers
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends learn how to count by playing games at Madame Gazelle's playschool.

episodes.name: Digging Up The Road
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family are trying to get to the playground, but Mr Bull's roadworks are in the way.

episodes.name: Freddy Fox
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

episodes.name: Whistling
episodes.overview: Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realises that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

episodes.name: Doctor Hamster's Tortoise
episodes.overview: Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets.

episodes.name: Sun, Sea and Snow
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the seaside where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

episodes.name: Grandpa Pig's Computer
episodes.overview: Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will the elderly hogs be able to use it?

episodes.name: Hospital
episodes.overview: Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is poorly in hospital.

episodes.name: Spring
episodes.overview: Grandpa Pig organises a chocolate egg hunt for Peppa and her friends. Will the piglets track down the treats?

episodes.name: Miss Rabbit's Helicopter
episodes.overview: Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

episodes.name: Baby Alexander
episodes.overview: Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

episodes.name: Grampy Rabbit's Lighthouse
episodes.overview: Grandpa Pig takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

episodes.name: Miss Rabbit's Day Off
episodes.overview: Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket - and everywhere else she works!

episodes.name: The Secret Club
episodes.overview: Suzy and Peppa start a secret club, but soon everyone wants to join!

episodes.name: Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard
episodes.overview: Grandpa Pig goes to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard to have his boat fixed.

episodes.name: Shake, Rattle and Bang
episodes.overview: Madame Gazelle brings lots of musical instruments into playgroup for the children.

episodes.name: Champion Daddy Pig
episodes.overview: Daddy Pig loses his title as champion puddle jumper.

episodes.name: Chatterbox
episodes.overview: Peppa tries to prove to Suzy Sheep that she is not a chatterbox.

episodes.name: Mr Fox's Van
episodes.overview: When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Mr Fox has everything in his van - even a chicken!

episodes.name: Chloe's Big Friends
episodes.overview: Peppa and George go to play with their cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any childish games.

episodes.name: Gym Class
episodes.overview: Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where they learn how to be real explorers.

episodes.name: The Blackberry Bush
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden so that they can make a pie.

episodes.name: Pottery
episodes.overview: Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

episodes.name: Paper Aeroplanes
episodes.overview: Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing - because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper aeroplanes!

episodes.name: Edmond Elephant's Birthday
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

episodes.name: The Biggest Muddy Puddle in the World
episodes.overview: Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

episodes.name: Santa's Grotto
episodes.overview: Peppa and George pay a visit to Father Christmas. Peppa asks for a very special doll as a present, but will Santa be able to deliver it to her?

episodes.name: Santa's Visit
episodes.overview: Peppa and George wake up very early on Christmas morning - has Santa delivered the presents they want?

episodes.name: Potato City
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family visit a new theme park where there is lots of fun to be had with vegetables.

episodes.name: The New House
episodes.overview: Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbours are?

episodes.name: Basketball
episodes.overview: Daddy teaches the children how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

episodes.name: Horsey Twinkle Toes
episodes.overview: There is much excitement when Mr Zebra delivers a package from Aunt Dottie for Peppa and George.

episodes.name: Naughty Tortoise
episodes.overview: Dr Hamster's pet tortoise Tiddles gets stuck up a tree - who is going to come to the rescue?

episodes.name: Mr Fox's Shop
episodes.overview: Peppa and George visit Mr Fox's Shop to buy Granny and Grandpa an anniversary present, but what will they choose?

episodes.name: Shadows
episodes.overview: Peppa and George realise that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

episodes.name: International Day
episodes.overview: Peppa and all her friends at playgroup dress up as different countries from all over the world.

episodes.name: The Rainy Day Game
episodes.overview: Daddy teaches Peppa and George a fun game to play while they wait inside for the rain to stop.

episodes.name: Mummy Rabbit's Bump
episodes.overview: Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with a big tummy and they learn that there is a baby bunny inside.

episodes.name: Pedro the Cowboy
episodes.overview: Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

episodes.name: Peppa and George's Garden
episodes.overview: Grandpa Pig pops round with some seeds for Peppa and George. Daddy Pig helps out by being a scarecrow.

episodes.name: The Flying Vet
episodes.overview: Doctor Hamster is rushed off her feet when nearly all the animals need her help on the same day.

episodes.name: Kylie Kangaroo
episodes.overview: Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

episodes.name: Captain Daddy Dog
episodes.overview: Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

episodes.name: Grampy Rabbit's Dinosaur Park
episodes.overview: To celebrate Freddy Fox's birthday, the children go on a trip to a Dinosaur Park. With Grampy Rabbit as their leader, they follow dinosaur footprints to find Freddy's birthday treat.

episodes.name: Bedtime Story
episodes.overview: Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

episodes.name: Lost Keys
episodes.overview: After a family trip to a mountain beauty spot, Daddy Pig loses the car keys down a drain.

episodes.name: George's New Dinosaur
episodes.overview: When his favourite toy dinosaur breaks, George visits Mr Fox's Shop to find a new one.

episodes.name: Grandpa Pig's Train to the Rescue
episodes.overview: Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his little train, Gertrude.

episodes.name: The Pet Competition
episodes.overview: Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet…

episodes.name: Spider Web
episodes.overview: Eek! There's a spider in the house! Mummy Pig tells Daddy Pig to get rid of it.

episodes.name: The Noisy Night
episodes.overview: Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

episodes.name: The Wishing Well
episodes.overview: Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

episodes.name: Mr Potato's Christmas Show
episodes.overview: Hoor-oink! It's Christmas, and Playgroup is going to the theatre to see a special performance. Some people have never been to a theatre before.

episodes.name: Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party
episodes.overview: The children are sad because their favourite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving Playgroup. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

episodes.name: The Queen
episodes.overview: Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's Award for Industry, and Peppa and her friends are to accompany her to the palace to meet the Queen!

episodes.name: Desert Island
episodes.overview: When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

episodes.name: Perfume
episodes.overview: After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

episodes.name: Children's Fete
episodes.overview: The school roof has a leak again, so the children organise a fete to raise money for a new roof.

episodes.name: The Aquarium
episodes.overview: Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

episodes.name: George's Racing Car
episodes.overview: It's a beautiful day, but Peppa, George and Grandpa Pig are sitting inside watching the motor racing on the television!

episodes.name: The Little Boat
episodes.overview: Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's little boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

episodes.name: The Sandpit
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses and shops.

episodes.name: Night Animals
episodes.overview: It's night time at Grandpa and Granny Pig's house, and Peppa and George have stayed up late to help hunt for slugs and snails.

episodes.name: Flying on Holiday
episodes.overview: The Pig family are going on holiday. Peppa and George pack their favourite toys and Granny and Grandpa are left to look after Goldie the Fish.

episodes.name: The Holiday House
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family go to Italy, where Daddy Pig finds driving on the other side of the road difficult.

episodes.name: Holiday in the Sun
episodes.overview: The piglet and her family spend their first day in their Italian holiday villa before visiting a nearby village, where they find plenty of things to buy.

episodes.name: End of the Holiday
episodes.overview: The piglet and her family return from their holiday, while Suzy has missed her friend and is eager to see her again.

episodes.name: Mirrors
episodes.overview: George enjoys seeing his reflection in the mirror so much that he and Peppa try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

episodes.name: Pedro Is Late
episodes.overview: The playgroup is going on an outing to the museum. Everyone is on the bus ready to go, except Pedro Pony. Where is he?

episodes.name: Garden Games
episodes.overview: Peppa and Suzy are bored because they have nothing to do, so Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

episodes.name: Going Boating
episodes.overview: Everyone is down at the lake as it's a perfect day to go boating. Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire and Daddy Pig picks one with pedals. But when all the families have a race, he soon wishes he had picked something easier to sail.

episodes.name: Mr Bull In A China Shop
episodes.overview: While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

episodes.name: Fruit
episodes.overview: It's fruit day at the market and Miss Rabbit is making smoothies from people's favourite fruit. When she gives George a special 'dinosaur' juice to make him big and strong... Roar!

episodes.name: George's Balloon
episodes.overview: George finds it difficult to keep hold of his big dinosaur balloon, and he is afraid that it will float away.

episodes.name: Peppa's Circus
episodes.overview: When Grandpa Pig puts up a tent in his garden, Peppa and her friends put on a circus.

episodes.name: Fish Pond
episodes.overview: Daddy Pig is looking forward to taking Peppa and George to visit a fish pond that he used to visit when he was a piglet. However, a few things have changed since then...

episodes.name: Snowy Mountain
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle, is very good and was once a world champion.

episodes.name: Grampy Rabbit in Space
episodes.overview: Peppa's playgroup are really enjoying Grampy Rabbit's talk about space rockets, until suddenly he loses his voice. Can Doctor Brown Bear get him speaking again?

episodes.name: The Olden Days
episodes.overview: Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep some old photographs from when they were babies.

episodes.name: Pirate Treasure
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends are playing pirates. But when they put together a treasure chest and bury it in a marked spot, Pedro soon realises that he needs to follow the trail. He's lost something!

episodes.name: Playing Pretend
episodes.overview: When Peppa's bike gets a flat tyre that needs mending, Peppa and her friends have fun riding their imaginary bikes and jumping in pretend muddy puddles!

episodes.name: The Castle
episodes.overview: Mummy and Daddy Pig take Peppa and George to a castle to feast on medieval banquets, play King and Queen and even meet a dragon. It's George's favourite day ever!

episodes.name: Miss Rabbit's Taxi
episodes.overview: Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and the family in her taxi to Granny and Grandpa Pig's house to drop off their shopping, but that's not the last trip of the day for her!

episodes.name: Scooters
episodes.overview: Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to school on their scooters. When he decides that it would be quicker to ride back, he discovers that riding scooters is great fun. Mummy Pig thinks that they are fun too and they both ride the scooters when it's time to pick up the children.

episodes.name: Pumpkin Competition
episodes.overview: It's Halloween! Peppa has been helping Grandpa Pig carve his massive pumpkin. Now, with the help of Miss Rabbit, they have to work out how to get it to the pumpkin competition!

episodes.name: Gerald Giraffe
episodes.overview: A new student, Gerald giraffe, joins the playgroup. They try a challenge of hide and seek.

episodes.name: Parachute Jump
episodes.overview: The school roof is broken (again), so Mummy Pig is persuaded to do a parachute jump to raise money for the repairs.

episodes.name: Easter Bunny
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends are at Rebecca Rabbit's house for an Easter Egg hunt. But can they find the Easter Bunny hiding all of the chocolate eggs?

episodes.name: Simple Science
episodes.overview: Daddy Pig and Mr Bull are digging up the playground, so Daddy Pig decides to teach the kids some simple science. The first experiment - how many children does it take to pick up Madame Gazelle?

episodes.name: School Project
episodes.overview: It is school project time for Peppa and her friends, which means they have to build castles and bring them into playgroup! Mummy and Daddy Pig have lots of fun helping Peppa make hers, if only they could find the glitter...

episodes.name: Mummy Pig's Book
episodes.overview: Mummy Pig's book is finished, and it's time to show it off to Peppa and her playgroup friends. Unfortunately, Peppa and George lose some of the book when they are playing, and Mummy Pig has to think quickly to fix it.

episodes.name: Grandpa Pig's Greenhouse
episodes.overview: Peppa and George explore the greenhouse, and it is full of lovely tomatoes and basil. When it's time for dinner, Granny Pig takes all the ingredients they have grown and makes a tasty salad.

episodes.name: Molly Mole
episodes.overview: There is a new girl at school, and she quickly makes best friends with Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit. Molly shows them how good she is at digging while taking them on a tour of her underground house.

episodes.name: Move to Music
episodes.overview: Madame Gazelle gets Peppa and her playgroup friends to dance to all different styles of music.

episodes.name: London
episodes.overview: Madame Gazelle takes the whole class to London for the day where they are given a tour by the Queen herself!

episodes.name: The Police
episodes.overview: When the Police visit the school, officers Panda and Squirrel teach Peppa and her friends all about bicycle safety.

episodes.name: The Zoo
episodes.overview: The youngsters visit the zoo where they are shown arond by zookeepers Mr Lion, Mrs Crocodile and Mr Giraffe.

episodes.name: Canal Boat
episodes.overview: For Captain Daddy Dog's birthday, Mummy Dog surprises him with her present of a boat trip on a 'Canal Boat', which isn't quite what he was expecting.

episodes.name: Australia Part 1 - The Outback
episodes.overview: Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig embark on their first ever Australian holiday. They are visiting the Kangaroo family, who take them to explore the Outback on their first day.

episodes.name: Australia Part 2 - Surfing
episodes.overview: The Kangaroos take Peppa and her family to the beach on their second day in Australia, where they try surfing for the first time.

episodes.name: Australia Part 3 - The Great Barrier Reef
episodes.overview: Mrs Kangaroo takes everyone on an amazing adventure under the sea in her submarine to see the Great Barrier Reef!

episodes.name: Australia Part 4 - The Boomerang
episodes.overview: Sadly, Peppa and her family's holiday in Australia is coming to an end, but they still have time to play with a boomerang and make friends with Mr Wallaby.

episodes.name: Nursery Rhymes
episodes.overview: Madame Gazelle and the playgroup are sharing their favourite nursery thymes. From singing Little Bo Peep to marching along with The Grand Old Duke of York, everyone enjoys listening to each other's choice.

episodes.name: Masks
episodes.overview: Madame Gazelle sets the children a creative task - making masks. There are carrot masks, robot masks, and even pretty butterfly masks... The only thing missing is lots and lots of glitter!

episodes.name: Digger World
episodes.overview: Mummy and Daddy Pig take Peppa and George to Digger World. They have lots of fun building walls and knocking them over again, and even help Mr Bull when there's an obstacle in the road.

episodes.name: The Doll Hospital
episodes.overview: Teddy needs mending and cleaning after rolling down hills and jumping in muddy puddles, so Peppa takes her to Miss Rabbit's Doll Hospital. But she soon realises that she likes Teddy just the way she is.

episodes.name: Wendy Wolf's Birthday
episodes.overview: It's Wendy Wolf's birthday and she has invited Peppa and all her friends to her party! There are bubbles and balloons to play with - and Wendy even teaches them how to howl like a wolf!

episodes.name: George's Woolly Hat
episodes.overview: Mummy Pig is determined that George's new hat doesn't get muddy when Peppa and George visit Grandpa and Granny Pig. Everyone tries to make sure that it stays clean - even if it means that they get messy instead!

episodes.name: Sailing Boat
episodes.overview: Peppa and George go sailing with Grandpa Pig, but when he keeps getting stuck in the mud, they all decide to have a sleepover on the boat while they wait for the tide to come back in.

episodes.name: Soft Play
episodes.overview: It's Richard Rabbit's birthday party and George is invited. That can only mean one thing - soft play! George and friends have great fun, swinging, bouncing and climbing, but it isn't quite as much fun for the grown-ups!

episodes.name: The Market
episodes.overview: Peppa and family take a trip to the market to buy some apples, cheese and fish. However, they get more than they were expecting when they stop by Mr Fox's stall - he is selling some extra special items!

episodes.name: Father Christmas
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends put on a Christmas show for their parents.

episodes.name: Peppa Goes to Paris
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family go on a holiday to France with Delphine Donkey and her family.

episodes.name: Grandpa Pig’s Pond
episodes.overview: Peppa and George are helping Grandpa Pig to dig a brand new pond for his garden.

episodes.name: Once Upon A Time
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family go on a walk through the forests where they meet all their favourite fairytale characters.

episodes.name: Police Station
episodes.overview: George has lost Mr. Dinosaur. Maybe the police can help George find him.

episodes.name: When I Grow Up
episodes.overview: It is time for playgroup. Today Peppa and her friends are deciding what they might like to be when they grow up.

episodes.name: The Ambulance
episodes.overview: Dr. Brown Bear comes to visit the playgroup and teach all of the children what to do when there has been an accident.

episodes.name: Doctors
episodes.overview: When Tiddles the Tortoise gets stuck in a tree, Pedro Pony has trouble trying to rescue him.

episodes.name: Super Potato
episodes.overview: Mr. Potato has come to visit the playgroup and he brought along his superhero friend, Super Potato.

episodes.name: Grampy Rabbit's Hovercraft
episodes.overview: Grampy Rabbit's home-built hovercraft causes a stir amongst the snooty members of Grandpa Pig's sailing club.

episodes.name: Playgroup Star
episodes.overview: Peppa is sad to discover that Daddy Pig never got a reward star at Madame Gazelle's playgroup, not even for his drawing of a dragon, which he still has.

episodes.name: The Carnival
episodes.overview: The carnival comes to town, and it's a chance to see all sorts of exciting things.

episodes.name: Mr. Bull's New Road
episodes.overview: When Peppa takes Goldie the Fish for a visit to the vets, she is surprised when she finds that there's a new road to be built over the building.

episodes.name: Caves
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family enjoy a day out at the caves, with Grampy Rabbit as their tour guide.

episodes.name: Grandpa's Toy Plane
episodes.overview: Grandpa and Granny Pig share their toys and hobbies with Peppa and George. Granny has a special doll from childhood, but Grandpa builds toy planes.

episodes.name: George's New Clothes
episodes.overview: George, Peppa and Mummy Pig head off to Miss Rabbit's clothes shop to get George some brand new clothes; after trying on lots of new exciting outfits, George finds an outfit that suits him just right.

episodes.name: Madame Gazelle's House
episodes.overview: The Peppa family soon realizes that Madame Gazelle's house is being pushed over by a tall tree.

episodes.name: Long Train Journey
episodes.overview: When Daddy Pig receives a letter saying that he must go away on business to test some very important concrete, Peppa, Mummy and George decide to go along too. They all enjoy the very long train journey, snoozing and singing to pass the time.

episodes.name: Suzy Goes Away
episodes.overview: Mummy Sheep learns that she has got a new job, which means moving far away! Peppa and Suzy wonder how they can stay best friends? Peppa gives Suzy some presents to remember her by, before a surprising change for Mummy Sheep changes everything.

episodes.name: Tiny Land
episodes.overview: Peppa has a day out with her family and Suzy Sheep, visiting Tiny Land. They see tiny dinosaurs, their favourite tiny landmarks and even a tiny Miss Rabbit doing even more jobs!

episodes.name: Stamps
episodes.overview: Grandpa Pig shows Peppa and George his extensive stamp collection, which inspires them to send a postcard of their own! But when Grandpa gets a very special stamp in the post, he misplaces it. Where can it be?

episodes.name: Mandy Mouse
episodes.overview: Peppa's Playgroup have a new friend to meet - Mandy Mouse. Mandy uses a wheelchair. The children have a lot of fun playing with Mandy as she is super sporty and loves to play games.

episodes.name: Recorders
episodes.overview: The children have a music lesson with Madame Gazelle and all learn how to play the recorder. After lots of practising at home, the children put on a wonderful performance for all the parents to enjoy.

episodes.name: Miss Rabbit's Relaxation Class
episodes.overview: Mummy Pig is persuaded by Miss Rabbit to come along to her relaxation class to help Mummy Pig relax but actual relaxing proves to be more challenging than expected.

episodes.name: Parking Ticket
episodes.overview: When Daddy Pig gets a parking ticket whilst parked in the wrong place, Peppa and George learn that adults have rules too just like children and also get told off too.

episodes.name: Lots of Muddy Puddles
episodes.overview: On a day out with her family, Peppa is encouraged to find words to describe the different kinds of puddles they find.

episodes.name: Father's Day
episodes.overview: The pre-school adventures of a cheeky and slightly bossy little pig called Peppa, who lives with her mummy and daddy and little brother George. Sometimes these adventures involve a few tears but they always end happily.

episodes.name: Funny Music
episodes.overview: Daddy Pig has a new synthesiser. Peppa, George and Mummy Pig have fun finding and sampling sounds from around the house.

episodes.name: Buttercups, Daisies and Dandelions
episodes.overview: Cousin Chloe, Peppa and George pick flowers making daisy-chains and transforming George into a fearsome dandy-lion.

episodes.name: The Marble Run
episodes.overview: Peppa, George, Rebecca and Richard Rabbit have so much fun playing with the marble run. Though when Daddy Pig joins in, the marble run gets much bigger.

episodes.name: Grandpa Pig's Metal Detector
episodes.overview: When George loses his wind-up robot's metal key, Grandpa Pig uses his metal detector to find it and finds a lot of other things on the way

episodes.name: World Book Day
episodes.overview: It is World Book Day at playgroup but Peppa has so many favourite books she just cannot decide which to go as.

episodes.name: Children's Festival
episodes.overview: The family head to the Children's Festival.

episodes.name: Muddy Festival
episodes.overview: In her second day at the Children's Festival which its been muddy thanks to the rain Peppa learns about activities involving Mud.

episodes.name: Strawberries
episodes.overview: Peppa and George go strawberry picking with Granny and Grandpa.

episodes.name: Grandpa Pig's birthday
episodes.overview: It's Grandpa Pig's birthday and the family go out for a celebratory meal. Peppa has never been to a restaurant before.

episodes.name: The Petting Farm
episodes.overview: Peppa and friends visit a Petting Farm where they enjoy feeding chickens and meeting cute and squeaky guinea pigs and they all learn it's important to wash your hands after handling the little animal

episodes.name: Pizza! Pizza!
episodes.overview: It's almost lunchtime at Peppa Pig's house. Mummy suggest they all make pizza together, they have a lot of fun preparing and mixing up all the food to make their own pizzas - it's all so lovely and messy.

episodes.name: TV Land
episodes.overview: Peppa and George go behind the scenes to find out how TV is made. Miss Rabbit shows them around the set of Super Potato.

episodes.name: Roman Day
episodes.overview: Granny Pig, Peppa and George have fun dressing up as Romans, making a pebble mosaic of a Dinosaur and learn a little Latin too!

episodes.name: Bird Spotting
episodes.overview: Peppa and George are birdwatching with Grandpa Pig looking for birds and ticking them off in Grandpa pigs book.

episodes.name: Super Potato Movie
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends visit the cinema for the first time to watch the Super Potato movie.

episodes.name: Bat and Ball
episodes.overview: Madame Gazelle teaches the children how to play bat and ball, she teaches them so well that they beat her at the game and win!

episodes.name: Buried Treasure
episodes.overview: Peppa, George, Molly Mole and Freddy Fox dig a huge tunnel and find a box of pirate treasure and the police seem to be missing their pirate treasure. Something mysterious is going on.

episodes.name: Christmas at the Hospital
episodes.overview: When Peppa Pig has an accident and trips and hurts her arm on Christmas Day, the family have to go the hospital, where Santa pays a surprise visit

episodes.name: Valentine's Day
episodes.overview: Peppa explores special moments of togetherness with friends who are special to us.

episodes.name: The Perfect Day
episodes.overview: While Mummy Pig is enjoying a spa day out, Daddy, George and Peppa explore the rest of the shopping centre.

episodes.name: Breakfast Club
episodes.overview: Peppa and his friends arrive at school early to have breakfast together. In the breakfast club, they learn about how food gives energy and talk about their favourite breakfasts.

episodes.name: The Botanical Gardens
episodes.overview: Miss Rabbit shows Peppa's family around the Botanical Gardens.

episodes.name: Mr Potato's Fruit and Vegetable Quiz
episodes.overview: Peppa and his friends are at school and have a special guest, Mr. Potatoes. Mr. Potatoes is there to give them a fruit and vegetable test.

episodes.name: Viking Day
episodes.overview: Peppa and George join Grandma Piggy to play Viking. The Vikings enjoy Grandpa Piggy's boat until they realise they forgot about the picnic.

episodes.name: Made Up Musical Instruments
episodes.overview: In the game group, Peppa and his friends make their own instruments from old wrappers.

episodes.name: In the Future
episodes.overview: Peppa and Suzy are excited about the sleepover and sit up in bed talking about what they will do when they grow up.

episodes.name: Doctor Hamster's Big Present
episodes.overview: Peppa and his family are taking Goldie the Fish to Dr Hamster for a checkup. Dr. Hamster recommends that he get more exercise, and Grandpa Rabbit builds something to help him.

episodes.name: Butterflies
episodes.overview: Dr. Hamster goes to school to talk about butterflies. The children paint caterpillars, make butterfly wings and dance the butterfly's life cycle.

episodes.name: Grampy Rabbit's Jetpack
episodes.overview: It's raining and Grandpa Rabbit built a rocket pack. As he shows it to Peppa and George, he ends up on top of a snowy mountain. Miss Hare goes to rescue him, but Grandpa Rabbit rescues them all.

episodes.name: Detective Potato
episodes.overview: Peppa and George are watching Detective Potatoes on TV. When Piggy Dad loses his car in the parking lot, Detective Potatoes shows up and helps them.

episodes.name: The Electric Car
episodes.overview: Daddy Piggy arrives in a new electric car. The family goes for a ride and are surprised when the car talks and sings.

episodes.name: Stone Age Granny
episodes.overview: Granny and her friends' historical re-enactment society are being cave people today. Peppa and George join in helping to catch Grandpa Pig who is dressed as a woolly mammoth.

episodes.name: Space Adventure!
episodes.overview: Peppa and George are re-enacting the Apollo Moon Landing with the help of Granny Pig's historical re-enactment society. Grampy Rabbit has lent them his rocket, but no one has told him it's just pretend.

episodes.name: Fire Station Practice
episodes.overview: Today is the fire station practice day. Mummy Pig joins with the other mummies to practise fighting fires.

episodes.name: Mr. Bull the Teacher
episodes.overview: Madame Gazelle has to go to the dentist so she leaves the class with Mr. Bull. The children already know the subjects Mr. Bull suggests teaching, so he decides to show them how to fix a squeaky floorboard.

episodes.name: Looking for Things
episodes.overview: Mummy Pig is baking an apple pie, so Daddy Pig suggests Peppa and George play a game of looking for things. Peppa and George have fun running around the house solving the clues.

episodes.name: Poems
episodes.overview: Madame Gazelle introduces the children to poetry, explaining how sounds can be poems too. Together they make a poem about rain and perform it to the parents.

episodes.name: Please and Thank You
episodes.overview: Granny and Grandpa talk to Peppa and George about manners. Madame Gazelle teaches all the children about how wonderful it is to say "please" and "thank you".

episodes.name: Ice Cream
episodes.overview: Mr. Labrador has an ice cream van but runs out of ice cream. Granny Pig suggests Peppa and George make their own ice cream with the help of Mr. Labrador.

episodes.name: Science Museum
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends from playgroup visit a science museum.

episodes.name: Jukebox
episodes.overview: Peppa and George have fun dancing to music from a jukebox at Grandpa Pig's clubhouse.

episodes.name: Windmills
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup and Mr. Bull is building a wind turbine. Madame Gazelle tells the children all about wind power, while Mr. Bull and the workmen have a lovely cup of tea made from wind power.

episodes.name: Mandy Mouse's Birthday
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends go to Cheese World to celebrate Mandy Mouse's birthday.

episodes.name: The Sandcastle
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family have fun building a sandcastle at the beach.

episodes.name: America
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family win a trip to America. Miss Rabbit flies them to New York, where they meet a new Miss Rabbit.

episodes.name: The Diner
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family are driving in a large campervan across America. They stop at a diner and meet another Miss Rabbit.

episodes.name: Canyon Country
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family drive across America, where they fly over the canyon, ride the rapids and discover a cave from 700AD.

episodes.name: Hollywood
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family finally make it to Hollywood and arrive at the film set to meet Mr Potato and Hash Brown.

episodes.name: Motorbiking
episodes.overview: Peppa and George are in for a treat when they embark on a camping trip to the seaside with Granny and Grandpa.

episodes.name: Sea Treasure
episodes.overview: Peppa and George wake up in Granny and Grandpa’s motorbike tent by the sea. Peppa finds a message in a bottle with a telephone number on it – but who is it from?

episodes.name: Monkey Has a Cough
episodes.overview: Mummy Pig shows Peppa how to pretend by teaching her how to wink. Zoe has come to visit with her toy monkey, so Peppa teaches her what she’s learnt.

episodes.name: Police Car
episodes.overview: Police Officer Panda and Police Officer Squirrel have come to visit Peppa’s playgroup. They offer two lucky children the chance to spend the day with them.

episodes.name: Hop, Skip and Jump!
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends play some very active games in the garden and together they learn to hop, skip and jump.

episodes.name: Rescuing Miss Rabbit!
episodes.overview: Miss Rabbit’s Rescue Service has saved many people from tricky situations, but what happens when Miss Rabbit needs rescuing herself?

episodes.name: Peppa's Diary
episodes.overview: Peppa learns that Mummy Pig used to keep a diary when she was her age, so Peppa decides to give it a try.

episodes.name: Playing Golf
episodes.overview: George and Peppa spend the day playing golf with Grandpa Pig, but they are much more interested in the colourful minigolf course next door.

episodes.name: Creepy Crawly Safari
episodes.overview: The playgroup visits a nature reserve run by Mr Lion. The reserve specialises in tiny insects, bugs and butterflies, so Pedro brings along his pet stick insect Stephen.

episodes.name: Hoops
episodes.overview: Peppa's playgroup learn how to use hula-hoops.

episodes.name: The Park
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family visit the park.

episodes.name: The Lifeboat
episodes.overview: Peppa and Danny Dog learn about saving people in the sea with Grampy Rabbit.

episodes.name: Lucky Hamper
episodes.overview: Peppa's Playgroup help create a hamper of goods for a charity raffle.

episodes.name: Jelly
episodes.overview: While Mummy Pig is working on the computer, Peppa, George and Daddy Pig make a jelly to surprise her for working hard.

episodes.name: Potty Training
episodes.overview: Peppa, Suzy Sheep, Mummy and Daddy Pig teach George how to use his potty.

episodes.name: Trampolines
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends head to the trampoline park where Miss Rabbit teaches them how to bounce.

episodes.name: Health Check
episodes.overview: Mummy Pig takes Peppa to the doctors for her yearly health check up.

episodes.name: Skateboarding
episodes.overview: Everyone goes to the skate park with their bicycles, scooters and skateboards. While Peppa has fun playing around on Daddy's skateboard, she soon learns that he is  a bit of an expert.

episodes.name: Mountain Climbing
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends learn about climbing from Grampy Rabbit at the climbing centre.

episodes.name: Police Boat
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends are mistaken for pirates while sailing on the river with Grandpa Pig.

episodes.name: The Tractor
episodes.overview: At  Mrs Badger's farm Peppa and her friends learn how useful tractors can be.

episodes.name: Christmas with Kylie Kangaroo
episodes.overview: Peppa and her family visit Kylie Kangaroo for Christmas, and realise that Christmas is so much different in Australia!

episodes.name: Winter Games
episodes.overview: Everybody is once again skiing on the mountains, but an unpredictable Mummy Pig once again showcases her skiing skills.

episodes.name: Undersea Party
episodes.overview: Peppa celebrates Goldie's birthday by holding a undersea party - by turning the house into an underwater environment!

episodes.name: Talking
episodes.overview: Lotte Llama joins playgroup, and teaches the others on how to speak German.

episodes.name: Woodland Club
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends visit Mr. Wolf's Woodland Club.

episodes.name: Danny's Pirate Bedroom
episodes.overview: Peppa helps out with Danny Dog refurbishing his bedroom, and imagine a pirate adventure along the way.

episodes.name: Weather Station
episodes.overview: Peppa's playgroup learn about the weather.

episodes.name: Roller Disco
episodes.overview: Peppa and friends visit the Roller Disco rink.

episodes.name: Guinea Pigs
episodes.overview: Peppa looks after Madame Gazelle's guinea pigs Ginger and Brian while she goes on holiday, but prove to be more trouble for Mummy and Daddy Pig than they think.

episodes.name: Grandpa's Rock Garden
episodes.overview: Peppa and George help out Grandpa Pig create a rock garden.

episodes.name: Charity Shop
episodes.overview: Peppa, George and Daddy Pig visit the charity shop to sell things they don't need, and things they may need!

episodes.name: The Owl
episodes.overview: Peppa, George, Grandpa and Granny go owl-spotting.

episodes.name: The Apple Tree
episodes.overview: The family visit the apple tree, and notice how it changes every season as they keep visiting it.

episodes.name: Hippies
episodes.overview: Everyone turns into hippies for the day with Grampy Rabbit acting as the leader.

episodes.name: Bug Hotel
episodes.overview: Peppa and George check out Grandpa's new Bug Hotel.

episodes.name: Parachute Games
episodes.overview: The Playgroup play many games using a Parachute.

episodes.name: Kidde Workout
episodes.overview: Mr. Potato visits the playgroup to showcase an exercise class.

episodes.name: Little Cars
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends visit the Little Cars Play Center.

episodes.name: Flying Disks
episodes.overview: The family visit Danny Dog at the park, who has a new flying disks.

episodes.name: Grandpa Pig's Christmas Present
episodes.overview: Grandpa Pig receives a drone (or to him, a Quad-Copter) for Christmas, but he soon loses it.

episodes.name: Canoe Trip
episodes.overview: The family go canoeing.

episodes.name: The Holiday
episodes.overview: The family go on holiday to a small house, that's actually quite small!

episodes.name: Dinosaur Party
episodes.overview: Granny and Grandpa Pig hold a Dinosaur Party, with a few friends attending.

episodes.name: Superhero Party
episodes.overview: It's Pedro Pony's Birthday, which turns out to be super when Miss Rabbit is trapped on a giant balloon!

episodes.name: A Day with Doctor Hamster
episodes.overview: Peppa and Suzy spend the day with Doctor Hamster, and show how hard it can be to look after animals.

episodes.name: Swimming Lesson
episodes.overview: Peppa and her friends go for a swimming lesson with Miss Rabbit. However, her own sister Mummy Rabbit can’t swim, so she is given a lesson as well.

episodes.name: Cruise Ship Holiday
episodes.overview: Peppa and George decide to make this Father's Day the best day ever. George loses his wind-up robot's key. Daddy Pig gets a parking ticket. Daddy Pig has a new synthesiser.

episodes.name: Grandpa's Robot
episodes.overview: Peppa and George go to Granny and Grandpa Pig's house, where Grandpa Pig introduces his robot to them.

episodes.name: Mr Bull Digs Up the River
